Summary: looked like landing light-went from SW to NE -same brightness and size
trends: There has been one other sighting in Rutherfordton
There were no other sightings in Rutherfordton on or around October 28th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsI was on my rear deck when i noticed what looked like a planes landing lights coming from the SW,as it flew over there was no sound and just the light(same brightness) no other shape just the ball of light,it was low and slow enough that i should have heard something,it was going NE and stayed the same brightness till i couldnt see it anymore.
